summary: Lowe's (LOW) has been one of the stocks most watched by Zacks.com users lately. So, it is worth exploring what lies ahead for the stock.

headline: Lowe's Helps Kick Off Spring with its Annual SpringFest Event which Offers the Season's Best Deals; Plus Loyalty Members Get More
summary: With warmer weather and longer days approaching, homeowners across the country are ready to tackle home and garden projects big and small this spring season. Lowe's knows just how to help with the spring's BEST deals, exclusive products and brands and free loyalty member perks for both the homeowner and Pro. As the "springtime feeling" continues to inspire, Lowe's is empowering homeowners to tackle to-do lists and Pros to get their jobs done with the right tools and right help at the right time.
